title: DerikCH - Portifolio
name: </Derik Christian>
about-text: Hi, I'm Derik, a 22-year-old beginner web developer starting his career and studying to become a Full Stack Developer. I'm passionate about learning new things, logic, problem-solving, and building efficient systems. I enjoy tackling challenges with critical and analytical thinking, and I strive to create high-quality, clean, and effective solutions.
education-text: I have a strong grasp of HTML, CSS and JavaScript, and I'm currently learning frameworks like React and Bootstrap, as well as backend development with Node.js and MongoDB. I'm also pursuing a degree in Data Analysis, as I believe data can plays a vital role in every carrer, and combining development skills with data driven insights, is how we create real solutions for real-world problems.
qualities-text: I'm determined, motivated, and always seeking to improve and learn. Whether working independently or as part of a team, I focus on delivering high-quality results with great attention to detail.
objectives-text: I'm currently focused on developing new skills, refining the ones I already have, and seeking opportunities to expand my portfolio and gain hands-on experience. My goal is to continually grow as a developer and professional.
